</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[forceFlagTexture]]. Forced texture is different from your normal flag texture, which can be retrieved with [[flagTexture]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - vehicle, unit of flag pole

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getForcedFlagTexture]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[forceFlagTexture]], [[setFlagTexture]], [[flag]], [[flagOwner]], [[setFlagOwner]], [[setFlagSide]], [[setObjectTexture]], [[setObjectTextureGlobal]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[flagAnimationPhase]], [[Flag Textures]]
</value></part></template>
